comment: Hello , G coverage is available at LASU . Send G to to check if your device is compatible on the network . TT
amr:
# ::snt Hello , G coverage is available at LASU . Send G to to check if your device is compatible on the network . TT
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / hello)
      :snt2 (a / available-02
            :ARG2 (c / cover-03
                  :mod (p / product
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "G")))
            :location (u / university
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "LASU")))
      :snt3 (s / send-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p2 / product
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "G"))
            :purpose (c2 / check-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (c3 / compatible
                        :domain (d / device
                              :poss y)
                        :location (n4 / network))))
      :snt4 (c4 / company
            :name (n5 / name
                  :op1 "TT")))
